pages.text: 17|87|geuleona junim-ui eunhyega iss-eoss euni sillo geubun-ui eunhyega geudae wie keuge iss-eossnola

17|88|illeogalodoe ingangwa yeongmaga seolo gat-ihayeo i kkulangwa gat-eun geos-eul mandeullyeo haedo geudeul-eun geuwa gat-eungeos-eul mandeulji moshalila bilog geudeul seologa seololeul dounda haedo geuleo hanila
17|89|sillo hananim-eun i kkulan-eseo ingan-eul wihayeo yeoleo gaji biyuleul deul-eo seolmyeonghayeoss-euna daedasuui salamdeul-eun ileul geoyeoghago bulsinhadeola
17|90|geudaega ulileul wihayeo ttang-e seo mul-eul sosge hal ttaekkajineun geudaeleulmidji anh-eulila malhadeola
17|91|geudaega jonglyeonamuwa podona muui jeong-won-eul gajyeo geu an-e mul-i neomchyeo heuleudolog hal ttae kkajineun geudaeleul midji anihal geos-ila
17|92|geudaeui jujangdaelo haneul-eul san sanjogag-eul naeeo uli wie tteol-eotteu ligo hananimgwa cheonsadeul-eul delyeowa daemyeonsikila hadeola

17|93|geudaega geum-eulo jangsigdoen jib-eulgajgeona geudaega haneullo seungcheonhanda hayeodo ilg-eul gilog-eul gajyeooji a nihandamyeon ulineun geudaeui seungcheon-eul midji anh-eulila malhani illeogalodoenaui junimkke yeong-gwang-i iss-eusoseo na neun ingan-eulosseo han seonjija-e bulgwa ham-ila
17|94|bog-eum-i geudeul-ege ileuleoss-eul ttae baegseongdeullo hayeogeum mid-eum-eul banghae haessdeon geos-eun danji geudeul-i malhan igeos-ila hananim-i ingan-eul seonjijalo bonaessdan mal-inyo
17|95|illeogalodoe ttang-wie jeongchaghayeopyeong-onhi geodneun cheonsadeul-i issdamyeon ha nanim-eun haneullobuteo cheonsaleul han seon jijalo geudeul-ege bonaess-eulila
17|96|illeogalodoe nawa neohui sai e jeung-in-eulosseoneun hananimman-eulo chungbunhanola geubun-eun geubun-ui jong-eul a simgwa bosim-eulo chungmanhagi ttaemun-ila
